verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًا

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “It has been revealed to me that a group of jinn listened ˹to the Quran,˺ and said ˹to their fellow jinn˺: ‘Indeed, we have heard a wondrous recitation.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul oohiya ilayya annahu istamaAAanafarun mina aljinni faqaloo inna samiAAnaqur-anan AAajaba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًا

translations.text: It leads to Right Guidance so we believed in it, and we will never associate anyone with our Lord ˹in worship˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yahdee ila arrushdi faamannabihi walan nushrika birabbina ahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا

translations.text: ˹Now, we believe that˺ our Lord—Exalted is His Majesty—has neither taken a mate nor offspring,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waannahu taAAala jaddu rabbinama ittakhatha sahibatan wala walada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًا

translations.text: and that the foolish of us used to utter ˹outrageous˺ falsehoods about Allah.<sup foot_note=77556>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waannahu kana yaqoolu safeehunaAAala Allahi shatata
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا

translations.text: We certainly thought that humans and jinn would never speak lies about Allah.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanna thanannaan lan taqoola al-insu waljinnu AAala Allahikathiba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا

translations.text: And some men used to seek refuge with some jinn—so they increased each other in wickedness.<sup foot_note=77557>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waannahu kana rijalun minaal-insi yaAAoothoona birijalin mina aljinni fazadoohumrahaqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًا

translations.text: And those ˹humans˺ thought, just like you ˹jinn˺, that Allah would not resurrect anyone ˹for judgment˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waannahum thannoo kama thanantuman lan yabAAatha Allahu ahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا

translations.text: ˹Earlier˺ we tried to reach heaven ˹for news˺, only to find it filled with stern guards and shooting stars.<sup foot_note=77558>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanna lamasna assamaafawajadnaha muli-at harasan shadeedanwashuhuba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْـَٔانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا

translations.text: We used to take up positions there for eavesdropping, but whoever dares eavesdrop now will find a flare lying in wait for them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanna kunna naqAAudu minhamaqaAAida lissamAAi faman yastamiAAi al-anayajid lahu shihaban rasada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا

translations.text: Now, we have no clue whether evil is intended for those on earth, or their Lord intends for them what is right.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanna la nadree asharrunoreeda biman fee al-ardi am arada bihim rabbuhumrashada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًا

translations.text: Among us are those who are righteous and those who are less so. We have been of different factions.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanna minna assalihoonawaminna doona thalika kunna tara-iqaqidada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًا

translations.text: ˹Now,˺ we truly know that we cannot frustrate Allah on earth, nor can we escape from Him ˹into heaven˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanna thanannaan lan nuAAjiza Allaha fee al-ardi walan nuAAjizahuharaba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا

translations.text: When we heard the guidance ˹of the Quran˺, we ˹readily˺ believed in it. For whoever believes in their Lord will have no fear of being denied ˹a reward˺ or wronged.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanna lamma samiAAnaalhuda amanna bihi faman yu/min birabbihifala yakhafu bakhsan wala rahaqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا۟ رَشَدًا

translations.text: And among us are those who have submitted ˹to Allah˺ and those who are deviant. So ˹as for˺ those who submitted, it is they who have attained Right Guidance.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanna minna almuslimoonawaminna alqasitoona faman aslama faola-ikataharraw rashada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا

translations.text: And as for the deviant, they will be fuel for Hell.’”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waama alqasitoona fakanoolijahannama hataba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَـٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًا

translation.text: surely We (would) have given them to drink

translations.text: Had the deniers followed the Right Way, We would have certainly granted them abundant rain to drink—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waallawi istaqamoo AAala attareeqatilaasqaynahum maan ghadaqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا

translations.text: as a test for them.<sup foot_note=77559>1</sup> And whoever turns away from the remembrance of their Lord will be admitted by Him into an overwhelming punishment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Linaftinahum feehi waman yuAArid AAanthikri rabbihi yasluk-hu AAathaban saAAada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَـٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًا

translations.text: The places of worship are ˹only˺ for Allah, so do not invoke anyone besides Him.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanna almasajida lillahi falatadAAoo maAAa Allahi ahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا

translations.text: Yet when the servant of Allah<sup foot_note=77560>1</sup> stood up calling upon Him ˹alone˺, the pagans almost swarmed over him.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waannahu lamma qama AAabdu AllahiyadAAoohu kadoo yakoonoona AAalayhi libada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I call only upon my Lord, associating none with Him ˹in worship˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul innama adAAoo rabbee walaoshriku bihi ahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا

translations.text: Say, “It is not in my power to harm or benefit you.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul innee la amliku lakum darranwala rashada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا

translations.text: Say, “No one can protect me from Allah ˹if I were to disobey Him˺, nor can I find any refuge other than Him.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul innee lan yujeeranee mina Allahiahadun walan ajida min doonihi multahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا بَلَـٰغًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا

translations.text: ˹My duty is˺ only to convey ˹the truth˺ from Allah and ˹deliver˺ His messages.” And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger will certainly be in the Fire of Hell, to stay there for ever and ever.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa balaghan mina Allahiwarisalatihi waman yaAAsi Allahawarasoolahu fa-inna lahu nara jahannama khalideenafeeha abada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا

translations.text: Only when they see what they have been threatened with will they know who is weaker in helpers and inferior in manpower.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatta itha raaw mayooAAadoona fasayaAAlamoona man adAAafu nasiranwaaqallu AAadada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا

translations.text: Say, “I do not know if what you are promised is near or my Lord has set a distant time for it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul in adree aqareebun ma tooAAadoonaam yajAAalu lahu rabbee amada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا

translations.text: ˹He is the˺ Knower of the unseen, disclosing none of it to anyone,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAalimu alghaybi fala yuthhiruAAala ghaybihi ahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًا

translations.text: except messengers of His choice. Then He appoints angel-guards before and behind them
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa mani irtada min rasoolinfa-innahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi rasada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا۟ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدًۢا

translations.text: to ensure that the messengers fully deliver the messages of their Lord—though He ˹already˺ knows all about them, and keeps account of everything.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: LiyaAAlama an qad ablaghoo risalatirabbihim waahata bima ladayhim waahsa kullashay-in AAadada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
